simple: if you want no opinions. Just initializes configs and empty directories
react: React + React Router + Stylus + ES6 / JSX
hipster: node-webkit, CoffeeScript + Less + Jade, Angular, Bootstrap
chaplin: Backbone, Chaplin, CoffeeScript. One of the most popular skeletons
ember: Official Ember.js starter kit + Handlebars + CoffeeScript + Stylus
exim: Neat Flux-based Exim framework on top of React and optional CoffeeScript.
